title: ESI Grips slide on three new Extra Chunky, Ribbed Silicone Grips including 35mm Fatty’s
content:
ESI Grips has released three new models of slide-on silicone grips, girthier than ever to deliver even more vibration damping under the palm of your hand. Designed to fit 22mm bars, the Ribbed Chunky, Ribbed Extra Chunky, and Fatty’s grips deliver shock absorption at diameters of 32mm, 34mm, and 35mm, respectively. ESI Grips have filed

The post ESI Grips slide on three new Extra Chunky, Ribbed Silicone Grips including 35mm Fatty’s appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
